Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Logan Square. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Logan Square.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service. Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
